schema.name: Healthtyfied Kimchi Curry Soup

recipeInstructions.text: Mince the garlic and ginger, and chop the white onion.
Cut the beef tenderloin into thin strips.
In a large pot, heat a tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic, ginger, and chopped onion, sautéing until they are soft and fragrant, about 5 minutes.
Add the curry powder to the pot and stir well to combine with the sautéed ingredients, cook for 1 minute.
Increase the heat to medium-high and add the beef tenderloin strips. Cook until they are just browned, about 3-5 minutes.
Pour in the unsweetened coconut milk and add the red, sweet bell pepper. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to maintain the simmer for about 15 minutes.
Add the kimchi to the pot and continue to simmer for another 10 minutes.
In a separate pot, cook the noodles according to package instructions until tender, then drain.
Serve the curry soup over the cooked noodles.

schema.description: Indulge in the harmonious blend of flavors with our Healthtyfied Kimchi Curry Soup. This recipe is a perfect balance for those looking for a high-protein, low-carb, low-sugar, and high-fiber meal. Elevate your dining experience with a dish that not only promises a healthful journey but also embodies the essence of Healthyfied cooking.
